subdisciplines.name: Astroecology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interactions between organisms and their environment in space.

subdisciplines.name: Exobiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of extraterrestrial life and its potential for existing within our solar system and beyond.

subdisciplines.name: Planetary Science
subdisciplines.description: The study of the formation and evolution of planets and their potential for supporting life.

subdisciplines.name: Astrochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of chemical reactions and processes in space, including the formation of organic molecules and their potential for supporting life.

subdisciplines.name: Astrogeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the geology of celestial bodies, including planets, moons, and asteroids, and their potential for supporting life.
